name: Fratercula Arctica
description:
FRATERCULA ARCTICA 

! WORK IN PROGRESS !

Play as a Fratercula Arctica, a bird  that cannot fly very well !  You will progress in its natural environment with the aim of feeding your nest and exploring various more or less dangerous landscapes.
  • Manage your energy and food
  • Beware of Dangers 
  • Face the weather
  • Bring food back to your nest
Fratercula arctica is a group project. It is obviously only in its infancy. We are in full research in all aspects.  it will evolve a lot over time to arrive at an exploitable game (and maybe sellable?)

Lecocq Raphël (programming)

Autissier Julien (assets, animations, concepts)

Chartier Christian (assets, concepts)

Rodriguez Leitao Diogo (Game design, Level design, assets) Diogo Itch.io

Blueprint programming in UE4
